did.unittitle: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council "Meeting Minutes of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council" and Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America on Microfilm

origination.corpname: Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: Auburn (N.Y.) Area Labor Council is part the New York State AFL-CIO which is a federation of 3,000 affiliated public sector, private sector, and building trades unions throughout the state, representing 2.5 million members, retirees and their families

scopecontent.p: Contents of this collection are as follows: Amalgamted Meat Cutters. Jan 5, 1950-Dec. 3, 1953 ; Auburn Area Council. Jan. 16, 1951-Dec. 6, 1988 ; Auburn Area Coucil. Jan 8, 1985-Feb. 3, 1987.
Duplicate negative copies are available upon request.
